website_summaries.verdict: Appropriate for those with glasses and helmets because of its thin design. Also stays put when exercising.
pros: Good volume and average sound quality
Secure when exercising, and thin design fits under helmets
Decent durability as long as you treat them properly
cons: Concerns about the cheap plastic feel of the ear clips

customer_reviews.title: The left phone has a shorter cable than the right, which is meant to drape behind your neck.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of these headphones. I can't stand earbuds and I dislike big over-the-ear isolating phones. I really like that these phones are relatively small and unobtrusive and do not require a heavy band over the top of my head. I can even wear them with a hat or a bicycle helmet. I've been buying them since 2011. I'm sure there are other comparable designs, but when I break or lose my Audio Technica immediately headphones, I immediately try to replace them with the exact same model. For more specifics, please read some of the longer 5-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: B. H. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: These are really good
customer_reviews.text: I Have had these since July of Last Year and they still are in one piece and fully functional (Tbh the main reason I got these was because they closely resembled the one Makoto Yuki has but I still love them anyways) Are pretty good the sound is pretty great imo, it’s nice to just walk around while having them on,and if they were to break I would definitely buy them again. (am low key thinking of getting backup pairs just in case)
customer_reviews.author: Academia04

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it with one tiny tiny caveat.
customer_reviews.text: These ear clips sound good. Basically a full sounding flat response--a signature I prefer. Price was right, they look attractive and they stay on. I knocked a star off because the clips that go around your ears are a tad sharp, like the finish near the bottom wasn't buffed and remains edgy. That said, a nail file did the trick and now they are so comfortable I can wear them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Inasilentway

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable????!!!
customer_reviews.text: This are ok for the price, bit flimsy but not good for kids as its difficult to put on. Giving one start because they are not returnable even after 3 days of receiving them. This is the first time I see an item in Amazon that is not returnable or replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: MAHE

customer_reviews.title: Very high leakage
customer_reviews.text: I did what any persona fan did and bought those blindly. Bad news, they suffers from a very high sound leakage. Basically, everyone will hear what you are hearing in HD (seriously, I had my little brother wear it for a test run and I could hear the songs loud and clear). I repackaged it and hid it in my closet (since I have no use for headphones with that high leakage) as a collector's edition or memento He he.
customer_reviews.author: Waleed

customer_reviews.title: P3 protagonist headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I got these solely for the fact that they are identical to the headphones the P3 protagonist wears, but they aren't bad as far as actual performance. The sound is pretty clear and crisp. The bass is lacking, and you can hear everything and everyone around you, but that's inherent to the design of these headphones, since they're more of a fashion accessory. For the price, you're getting cool looking headphones with an enjoyable sound.
customer_reviews.author: NewBeat1315

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: For the first two weeks that I had these they worked great. Then the part that goes around your ear on the right side broke. It appeared to have just popped out, so I popped it back in. It kept falling out. I've now had them less then a month and they won't allow a return or replacement. So I am forced to shell out money for a new set...again....
customer_reviews.author: Eva Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Persona
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to buy decent priced persona looking headphones, and these were the perfect match. Price wasn't bad and sound quality is good. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's surprisingly durable. There's been many times where I fell asleep wearing them and the plastic holder popped off. But, it was pretty easy just popping it back in. The sound quality lacks a little bass, but it ultimately doesn't bother me that much. Depends on your preferences. Your ear does become a little bit sore, having the headphones attached to you for a long period of time, but you generally get used to it. It's decent. I like it. Might get a different color though.
customer_reviews.author: Young Man

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Product sound was not very good. One headphone kept cutting in and out. That same headphone kept falling off my ear during a run. I don’t think these were new? I tried to return because they don’t work but says ineligible. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Totally happy, great sound perfect fit and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I buy these to be the ones I will carry with my Nintendo 3DS, so I needed the headphones to be lightweight and small, well this have those features and include the extra feature of being extra comfortable, almost the perfect choice for my needs. The arch that is around your ear is made in some sort of silicone that is comfortable, I wear these until the battery run out and I didn't have my ears with marks or smashed for the long period of time. The only drawback for me was the cable length was a little longer than I expected, but it is not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Serrano Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Better sound then expected.
customer_reviews.text: For an on ear head phone and $13 this is a fantastic buy. I wear these for my work and at home listening to music and these have a good sound and range. As for comfort I can say they only start to bother me after 2 hours or more and for me that is long enough for an on ear small cheap pair like these. I've only had these for about 2 weeks so I can't say anything about durability or how long they will last but they are audio technica so I would say a good while. I am getting a few more pairs for friends because they try to steal mine all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Animelover

customer_reviews.title: Quick deliver, light, but not noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: It came way earlier than expected. So that alone is a huge plus. It is also smaller and lighter than I expected, which is good for going around with it. However, if you are looking for headphones that you can play on high volume without having other people hear it, this might not be the right one for you, because the speaker is actually exposed. Another thing would be that it doesn't block out the sound from the outside entirely because it just rests above your ears, making the sound softer than if you were used to actual headphones or earphones. Overall it meets my personal purposes, but it will still depend on you.
customer_reviews.author: Betina Mascenon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound. Stay in place. Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair several years ago. They are still working great. Good sound and good quality. They stay in place and the clips haven't broken...which is the fate my last pair (different brand) met at the hands of my toddler. Such a good product, I now plan to buy two more pair for my 4 & 6 year olds, so they stop using mine on plane rides. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these cannot be beat. I also purchased the $6 panasonic ear buds which I donated to my sister for middle school. These are to be thrown into my laptop bag as an anytime headphone. I also have the audio technical ath-ew9 wooden clip ons. They're obviously much better but these are the disposable version of those. would buy again. Extremely comfortable. There is a sliding wire adjustment thing on the headphones wires which I cut off and I like them much better now. Cable and input jack itself surprisingly robust. Shipping from japan took a couple weeks as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: Little brother is an avid anime fan and asked for these pair of headphones as a Christmas gift. Keep in mind the headphones are inexpensive and will be made of plastic. The kid has a pair of solo beats (not allowed to take to school) so he only uses the headphones for aesthetics and to school. The cord is lengthy, has held up without breaking and with great sound but they do hurt his ears after 4 hrs of constant hearing time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Became my main headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. After trying on many clip on headphones, these seemed to be the ones that fit perfectly. The sound quality is pretty good, though there is a little sound leakage at higher volumes. For me, these headphones are very comfortable and I have been able to wear them for long sessions at a time without signs of discomfort or pain. Overall, really good headphones, will be buying more once my current pair bite the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Zan Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sturdy, and the unique shape makes it easy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried a set of headphones shaped to go over the ear like this before, but this is a great piece of equipment. I have worn these now for a while, and have even seen my sister buy a pair. These headphones are great to move around in. It's so comfortable that I can forget I'm wearing these easily. I took them out for a long hike to a waterfall, and they even held on as I was slipped on the rocks. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Khou

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at work since were not allowed to have bluetooth headphones, and the work provided ones while overear and supremely comfortable have this ridiculously long length. Also since these are ear only they dont upset the hair fibers on my scalp. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Standard
customer_reviews.text: It may just be me but the first week of use the ear hangers gave me a rash. I'm not use to these types of earphones but I got use to them with time. I don't know if I just don't know how to properly use thw earphones but the wires keep getting in the way. Over all I still like them so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my red pair broke. I was expecting the same model, but the plug part for this is STRAIGHT and not L-SHAPED like with my old red pair. :c I like the L-shape more because I have a tendency of placing my ipod/iphone in my pocket.. it moves around in there, and doesn't bend the wire. With this, I'm afraid it's life expectancy will not last as long.. But still one of my favorite headphones. Decent price, decent quality, and really cool to wear. Not many people have seen these where I'm from, and they always ask where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Aki

customer_reviews.title: the look was good and I liked the brand
customer_reviews.text: It was a spur of the moment thing I did when I ordered these over the ear headphones..I needed a pair as I lost my stock Samsung ear phones ..the look was good and I liked the brand ..however when it arrived I was disappointed with the quality of the materials, and the clear plastic holders on top did not hold the earphone in place properly but the worst thing about it was the sound ..it was thin sounding and tinny I do understand this item is not a top of the line product but I did expect to heard bass and treble not a flat sound I'm afraid I can't recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Stunning quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these for my Persona 3 (P3) cosplay. But I use them regularly, the sound quality is AMAZING, it's even clearer than my $100 turtle beaches! Clear, crisp audio. One minor complaint, that's my own fault for not reading, so not taking off stars- they are TINY. If you have a medium to big head, the headphones will barely cover 50% of your ear. But I do not regret this purchase. I'm totally buying another, one to use, and one for cosplay only.
customer_reviews.author: Dusk Shadow

customer_reviews.title: with the intention of keeping whichever ones sounded better. For me Sony won
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and a pair of Sony MDR-Q38LW's, with the intention of keeping whichever ones sounded better. For me Sony won, but I handed this pair to my wife and she's still using them. All things considered, I'd call that a seal of approval.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect AWESOME quality but it does get the job done. I purchased this mainly for cosplay purposes although it does work great. Sound is pretty much like most standard headphones. Sound does leak out depending on where you use them so beware. They do though fit nicely but they feel very cheap and flimsy but if you're not rough with them then they'll do what you need em to do. If you like Audio Technica and looking for some on ear headphones then I'd say give them a try but if you're looking for some quality sound and less sound leakage you will have to look onward.
customer_reviews.author: Loserkashiwagi

customer_reviews.title: AT does it again
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a week here is my honest opinion: Sound: 5/5 - these headphones absolutely blow everything away in this price-range. take my advice, I own a few set of expensive cans. Durability: 3/5 - the foam is very soft and delicate. with careful use you wont tear it, but i did ): Comfort: 4/5 - these are great for working out but sometimes can be slightly uncomfortable. I don't notice it when im in the zone. Look 5/5- chrome! Value- 5/5 Keep it up AT
customer_reviews.author: Jayk the Snayk

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones so much!
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds hurt my ears so I have always had to use over the ear headphones like these and this is by far the best brand I've ever used. I've had mine for two years now with extensive use and they are still in great condition. The sound quality is amazing for the style of headphone and price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the perfect over the ear headphones. I wear glasses - they're a good fit, does not feel loose, and quite comfortable. Sounds is not the greatest but they are perfect for my audio books. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great for glasses
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok, you are not buying high quality headphones here. I needed something that works with glasses and these really do (ear buds hurt). Need to be careful of the clip though, it can break easily if you are not careful. This is the second set I have bought b/c I used them at work and also for working out and eventually broke them. They work perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Melitia

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend these when there are better headphones available for less
customer_reviews.text: These feel really cheap. I wouldn't recommend these when there are better headphones available for less. Update: It's December now and my headphones completely fell apart yesterday. The plastic holding the ear pieces together is extremely delicate. Despite the quality brand name these headphones are inferior to many free headphones and discount brands.
customer_reviews.author: Faery

customer_reviews.title: Solid, basic headphones that are really thin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on the number of positive comments. Luckily my expectations were not too high. The ear clips feel cheap and I'm awaiting the day these simply break off. The sound is good (I didn't expect super high fidelity). The big winner here is that they are very thin and light and make wearing them while watching a movie or listening to music in bed quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: These are great right up until they break on you.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, I've bought 3 of them now, but even I have to admit that these things are super fragile. As far as clip on headphones go, they are some of the lightest most comfortable with the best sound quality I've had, I just with they were more durable
customer_reviews.author: Yin C.

customer_reviews.title: Good head phones
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a cosplay (persona 3) but are very good headphones
customer_reviews.author: Alex Masters

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected. Quality better than expected. NEED HELP WITH SETUP, though!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them. They were smaller than expected. But when you put them on they are almost weightless. And the sound quality is superb. I know that the cords are at different lengths because you're supposed to put one behind your ear. But I don't know which and how it's supposed to look after you adjust/set it up. I end up having to wrap some of the cord around my neck. I use the headphones with my personal MP3 player that hangs around my neck which usually hangs down, stopping at around my belly button. So I was wondering if someone can help me figure out how to set up these headphones with a picture example and explanation?
customer_reviews.author: Wesley R.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly durable and great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These beauty's last about a year per purchase. They have great sound quality for the price and are surprisingly durable. I have accidentally ran them through the washer and dryer and they worked like nothing had ever happened to them. I have worn them in subzero temperatures at my work place and they function same as always afterwards. Sidenote: These can sound like 60 dollar headphones if you use an app called "viper4android" and its "convolver" feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are not shipping from Japan as everyone seems to think. They have already been imported and are being shipped by Amazon. They're great headphones and are really comfortable but they are smaller than you might think. They still cover the ear but I expected them to be a little bigger. They sound good but don't expect in-ear headphone sound or expensive headphone sound. They do what they do well and are a great buy considering they're under $15.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is average to be expected for the price and size of the headphones. Comfort is surprisingly great! Can't feel them at all, and they don't get in the way. One thing that I'd suggest is a clip, because you can't wear only one piece of the headphones without it pulling, but it's great! Small, but perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Hieronymus

customer_reviews.title: It's the sweetness
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because 1 they look cool and 2 Persona 3 fan ;p Anyway I decided to get these and the are awesome IMO. They are very comfy, fit nicely around my ears, they can weirdly enough be used as a mirror, sound is very good, could still hear pretty well around me but not enough that it disturbs me and my music, I had them on for a short run and they stayed on perfectly, this is a great headset. FYI: 1 cord is longer than the other, if you didn't know, but if your cool with that than go nuts. This headset works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: ... cosplaying from Persona 3 (Minato) these are a rather good alternative since the original audio technica's that the MC ...
customer_reviews.text: For those of you interested in cosplaying from Persona 3 (Minato) these are a rather good alternative since the original audio technica's that the MC uses are no longer around. The sound quality is pretty nice as well for ear-fit and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arkadiy

customer_reviews.title: Okay the cord connecting to the stero headset is much ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay the cord connecting to the stero headset is much shorter than the other one. The left one is 2 times shorter than the right. It is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking headphones that work great
customer_reviews.text: They're sleek, they're shiny, they're compact so you can take them anywhere. The earpieces fit snugly but not painfully. The sound quality is very good, with a decent amount of bass. I can hear all my music in the noisiest of environments, so these are the headphones for me. If the ones I have now wear out, I'm buying another set just like them!
customer_reviews.author: D7

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this headphone. I wasn't expecting much because of the price, but wanted to try it based on reviews. I can't speak to durability yet (I'll update after I've had them for a while), but when I first put them on, I was blown away by the sound quality. It actually sounds better than some of my other really expensive headphones. I couldn't believe. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: thephatp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality weird wire though
customer_reviews.text: It’s got good sound quality and great clip on feature so it doesn’t fall out of your ears when biking, running or working out. The wire is a little weird for the headphones but it’s adjustable to shorten one bud and make them around the same length, but over all good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good price for average earphones
customer_reviews.text: I think that how well most lower cost earphones work is subjective and depends on individual taste. I don't see a lot of difference in sound between most other than bass and that's a personal preference. I go for a comfortable fit first and these work well for me. Sound is average and that's what I expected for a low cost set
customer_reviews.author: MyPick

customer_reviews.title: My reviews of persona headphones
customer_reviews.text: Its awesome, alot of people and friends says they are cool and surprisingly very durable I got this like 5 months ago and It been thrown, in the washer and dropped on mutiple occasions but still sturdy as new, the only bad thing is that wearing them to long makes your eats sore buts that the only bad thing. Also if your the type of person who likes to sleep with music in your ears, theses headphones are what your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DavidKKim

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Style of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim, wanting to try it out and I ended up loving them so much that I might stick with this style of headphones rather than earbuds. The entire design is very good, has solid sound quality, and convenient to put in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got them because they resemble the persona 3 protagonist. The sound quality is good, but they aren't very loud compared to other headphones. Still very acceptable sound and terrific comfort. Love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Michael Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The sound is just ok but they don't last long.
customer_reviews.text: In less then six months, one side shorted out. First it became distorted and then you could only hear very low volumes of sound. The other side started shorting out not much later. Nothing special about the quality sound. Certainly nothing you'd expect from Audio Technica.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks just as great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks just as great. The sound quality is remarkable, not something you expect for that price but surprisingly enough these headphones are way above the average headphones by miles and miles, in terms of sound, and style.
customer_reviews.author: M & L

customer_reviews.title: I received many compliments about the headphones since people had never seen anything like them before
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these as part of a costume and ended up using them quite a bit! I received many compliments about the headphones since people had never seen anything like them before. Although they are very cool, like others have advised in reviews, I would probably not take them around everywhere you go. The plastic clips are incredibly brittle and broke after about 1-2 months of usage. That being said, I don't think that should discourage you from purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: It blew me away that it sound like ear buds. happy that I got them
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfy to wear I have a large head so this thing is a blessing
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound, If Delicate
customer_reviews.text: The thin plastic on one of the earpieces has already snapped, but the headphones work really well and have a wonderful sound. You just have to be delicate with then because the plastic that fits behind the ear is kind of flimsy. Also, I like that one of the cords to the earpieces is longer than the other, so the wire wraps around the back of your head rather than falling in front of you. And, yes, I did buy this because of Persona. But I kept it because it's a good set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Logan

customer_reviews.title: Earful of comfort
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy to mount, can't feel while wearing and they sound wonderful. The best devices I have found to use with my Kindle fire. I have at least 20 headphones, these are my favorites. I use another brand for over the ear noise cancelling. The swivel approach to mounting is genius.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Buzzing Noise
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these headphones, it's that there's this buzzing noise on the right side which gets really annoying. The problem got notice only after one or two hours of use right out of the package. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Smith

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound great, and fit well over my ears
customer_reviews.text: Everything i hoped for and more! These headphones sound great, and fit well over my ears. I have always had trouble with standard headphones because they never fit my head well enough and always ended up giving me a headache, but i don't have that problem with these! The cord short on one side and long on the other so their perfect for just draping around your neck when not in use. The sound quality is nothing to sneeze at either!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Can't find these in stores!
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, earbuds ate extremely uncomfortable for me. I love this over ear design without anything being stuck inside my ear. Sound is decent enough for me to watch videos on any device, but you're not going to get booming bass with these. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Pass for serious exercisers
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year, I refuse to wear them anymore. The clip on your ear has a hinge that opens away from your head and will pull open with even the slightest tug of the cord. Cord is shorter than I would like and the jack isn't 90 degrees. Pros: They're light and the sound quality is a solid B, Ill give credit where it's due. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerChef

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just like from the game. Good quality, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rbt2000j

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound in an extremely lightweight design
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound for such an extremely lightweight pair of headphones, but they're a little light on bass compared to the added weight & slightly more robust sound of my Koss KSC75 headphones
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Family

customer_reviews.title: I previously used and loved a set of sony ones but they were discontinued
customer_reviews.text: There are so few around the ear hook headphones. I previously used and loved a set of sony ones but they were discontinued.. these are very nice to wear and lay on. Id prefer a more rounded or rubbery around the ear hook, and wish the cords to the ears connected at tge base of the headphones directly instead of half way down the cord. but overall these are nice. Ive been using them for over a month now, good sound and havent broken.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B

customer_reviews.title: Great for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Great for cosplay/collectible. Absolutely horrible for actually listening to music, very low quality, but I didn't buy them for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to believe Audio Technica made this bad product since they are the makers of some of ...
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price. It is hard to believe Audio Technica made this bad product since they are the makers of some of the most awesome products like ATH M-70x. Not a great product if you're going with the name of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: VIVEK U

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bad cable
customer_reviews.text: The headphones had a great sound but the cable it's quite frágiles, after a month of a daily use the cable stop working, the headphones are ver y comfortable, lightweight and awsome
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are fairly comfortable and of good quality but just as an advanced ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are fairly comfortable and of good quality but just as an advanced warning, asymmetrical chords. If that's not an issue for you, feel free to pick these up, they're perfectly fine headphones. I just wasn't expecting the right side to be so much longer than the left side and that can be a bit frustrating. But of course that's just personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: John C Scott

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing, extremely comfortable and stylish! It's also very discreet!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sias

customer_reviews.title: The washer didnt win this time
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these, but for the price nothing beats it. I wasn't gonna right a reveiw, but this morning i put them in the wash and they still work like New.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not so great design.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was great, but the overall design seems rather shoddy. The clip on the right ear, after only a few days of use, wore down and refused to stay in the socket. Whether its an issue with the product line, or an isolated incident, I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soto

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy practiacl
customer_reviews.text: I love them, small and a really good sound. My only complain is that, they get a little uncomfortable to use after a while
customer_reviews.author: joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good but it hurts after a while..
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good for its price although after a little while my ears started to hurt before of the over the ear clip. The tangling is annoying but the sound is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: ... mostly because of Persona 3 (lol) but they're actually pretty nice. I haven't run into problems with them ...
customer_reviews.text: I got them mostly because of Persona 3 (lol) but they're actually pretty nice. I haven't run into problems with them so far, and they fit my ears perfectly since they're small. Just make sure you don't mindlessly toss them in your bag or something, these might break easily.
customer_reviews.author: アビー

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Audio was tinny, and not very loud at all. The clips pinched my ears and were uncomfortable to wear over extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: john simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, fits on comfortably and looks like persona 3 earbuds. Can't ask for much else.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: ... these for part of a costume and they are great for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for part of a costume and they are great for that purpose. But I would not recommend buying these headphones to actually listen to music with. They are flimsy and cheap. But I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lexx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound!! I have a problem wearing earbuds and these are the perfect option for me when walking, sitting in the doctor's waiting room, or anywhere else I would like to listen to my music privately.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, just a little quiet I'd all but I am fine with that as I barley turn my phone volume halfway.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for most
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s basically a steal great for walks and at home activities. Not so great for car rides but I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Black Rose Elora

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the headphones very much. Perfect fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: PC.

customer_reviews.title: Light Ear Clips
customer_reviews.text: Earphones work well. The ear clips swing out to make application easier. The only issue is the fear of breakage. They are very light, as advertised, and do not block much ambient noise.
customer_reviews.author: Howard S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: these damn ear plastic backing breaks off easily! I am very carefull with these and both have broken
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly light and amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how these feel and sound. Obviously I notice then on when I first put then on my ears, but after a minute or two I forget that I have headphones on due to these being so light. The sound quality is also the best I've heard in this price range. I'd recommend these to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: You guys do Minato proud. :D
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. They look perfect for my Persona cosplay. They work great too. Couldn't ask for a better pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: James Carlson

customer_reviews.title: It's lightweight and very good for people who can't use the ear plugs that ...
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and very good for people who can't use the ear plugs that go in your ear. The only thing is the plastic that goes around the ear is easy to break so be careful
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are pretty freakin' awesome. Like i thought I wasn't going to wear them all the time but I want to wear them all the damn time. I actually can too because they don't cancel out sound so if i need to hear I can but I won't have to worry about people talking to me. The sound on these things surprised me too. I guess it was because I lowered my expectations but either way these guys sound surprisingly decent. I say if you want them get 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Kingsly

customer_reviews.title: But I was surprised to find that they're actually pretty good headphones as well
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest here. One of the main reasons I bought these headphones is because the protagonist in Persona 3 wears them. But I was surprised to find that they're actually pretty good headphones as well. The sound quality is above average and gives off a crisp and clean sound. Overall, I'm happy with my my purchase. They not only sound good, but also look cool and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Yong

customer_reviews.title: They have one thing going for them. The price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty poor I find, and the wires are extremely thin and delicate. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and customer service, would definitely recommend this seller and would buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One of these things is not like the other.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, snug, comfortable fit and good sound. Only downside is one earphone has a longer cord than the other. I'm told this is by design, but it is not ideal for my use. I would rather both cords were the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: got this as a gift for my nephew, he loved it!
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my nephew, he loved it. It also came a LOT quicker in the mail than I was told it would.
customer_reviews.author: dreaming420

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy Audio Technica products
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy Audio Technica products, the sound is great on them. My only complaint is the plastic around the ear gets uncomfortable after an hour or two from listening.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: excellent clip on headphones
customer_reviews.text: Most lightweight clip-on headphones. HATE earbuds. LOVE these! Excellent sound. Feels very comfortable on ears. Fits snuggly without pinching. Hope they don't stop making them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME! JUST what I was looking for! I may buy another one soon as a gift for someone, and then get another for myself haha :p
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for use with hearing aids
customer_reviews.text: I wear hearing aids and these "on ear" headphones work great! Nice sound. Much more comfortable than in ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Landis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable with great audio quality. I'm using this for a cosplay but I'm attempted to use them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and fell apart quickly. I got maybe one to two months of use before they broke completely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Work well for me. Use one side only at work so I can hear phone. Lite weight forget have them. Wire could be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Capt_denis

customer_reviews.title: The sound is pretty good on these
customer_reviews.text: The sound is pretty good on these! They do look a lot like the ones the Hero from Persona 3 uses. The clips are nice and the headphones are pretty light that you sometimes forget that you have them on. Even when you just let them hang around your neck they are still pretty loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: A little advice...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised to find that these are actually slightly magnetic, so maybe don't put them right next to your paperclips.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product, they're so comfortable too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome!!! I got these for their appearance, my friends ask me if they're a new model since they're not so common. Regarding the sound is ok. I don't mind having to raise my volume higher.
customer_reviews.author: Jude Lee
